items.sentence: Tom thought he'd lost his wallet, but eventually found it after searching the house for an hour or so.
I wish I'd planted apple trees here when I first bought this property. If I had, we'd have apples now.
Harnessing electricity, said the man with the bongos, is a sinful perversion of the earth's resources.
A man with a long beard was playing the saxophone and a young girl, perhaps his daughter, was dancing.
I wasn't very good at speaking French until Tom and I started speaking French to each other every day.
